title: TypeIMG
description:
TypeIMG is an image optimization service that converts images into the modern WebP format without losing quality. 

With its "Safe Mode", TypeIMG intelligent algorithm analyzes images before and after optimization, preventing the appearance of compression artifacts, pixelation, and detail loss - so your optimized images remain visually identical to the originals. 

TypeIMG is the ideal solution for those who need to optimize images while maintaining perfect image quality.
